DataSource.Query: WITH all_discount AS ( SELECT checkouts.value_date, suppliers.supplier_name, SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) + SUM(checkout_detail_view.discount) AS purchase_amount, SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) AS invoicing_amount FROM purchase.purchases LEFT JOIN inventory.checkouts ON checkouts.checkout_id = purchases.checkout_id LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_detail_view ON checkout_detail_view.checkout_id = checkouts.checkout_id LEFT JOIN inventory.suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = purchases.supplier_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id WHERE NOT checkouts.deleted AND NOT suppliers.deleted AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.office_id IN (SELECT get_office_ids FROM core.get_office_ids(@OfficeId::int)) AND checkouts.value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date AND COALESCE(@SupplierId::int, 0) = 0 OR purchases.supplier_id = @SupplierId::int GROUP BY checkouts.checkout_id, checkouts.value_date, supplier_name, checkouts.discount ) SELECT value_date, supplier_name, purchase_amount, invoicing_amount, purchase_amount - invoicing_amount as difference_amount FROM all_discount ORDER BY value_date;
